text: Doesn't get much worse than this place! It's typical to hear about people getting shot or robbed at this place.  Best to avoid this bar

Great food and atmosphere. The owners are friendly. The late night weekend crowd is a whole different story. Not my type of scene unless your a youngster. Not for us older people but the afternoon and early evenings are fine

This is the div3 bar to be at on Saturday night.. Pizza is awesome and $2 coors Kitchen is open late and all the chicks are hot.   Not what i was expecting for a mckeesport bar!  Not feeling southside, id recommend cals as a happy medium with parking!
